events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster after reviewing keywords like software and developer.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidateâ€™s application process.
The candidate successfully passed the initial screening where their skills and experience were evaluated against the job requirements.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback, confirming their interest and availability for subsequent interviews.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the senior engineering team to assess coding and system design capabilities.
